title: Get Published! Metropolis Magazine to Feature Vision Awards Winners in Upcoming Print Edition
description: The Vision Awards offers unmatched exposure for architects and designers working across every stage of the creative process. The post Get Published! Metropolis Magazine to Feature Vision Awards Winners in Upcoming Print Edition appeared first on Journal.
author: Architizer Editors
excerpt: The Vision Awards just got even bigger! Architizer is thrilled to announce that the winners of the “Best of the Year” categories in the 2025 Vision Awards will be featured in Metropolis Magazine’s print edition later this year, placing the work of today’s most visionary architects, designers and creative professionals in front of a truly global audience.
text: The Vision Awards just got even bigger! Architizer is thrilled to announce that, addition to a host of other prizes, select winners in the “Best of the Year” categories in the 2025 Vision Awards will be featured in Metropolis Magazine’s print edition later this year, placing the work of today’s most visionary architects, designers and creative professionals in front of a truly global audience. Start Vision Awards Entry This prestigious collaboration marks a major milestone in the growth of the Vision Awards, which celebrates the radical ideas and visual creativity shaping the future of architecture. By partnering with Metropolis, a leading voice in sustainable and forward-thinking design for over four decades, the Vision Awards expands its reach and impact for entrants seeking greater visibility and professional recognition. Get Published in One of Architecture’s Longest-Running Print Magazines More than just a print publication, Metropolis operates at the convergence of architecture, design, and culture. Its award-winning platforms and global network of journalists reach an audience of architects, interior designers, clients, specifiers, educators, and industry influencers. Through print, digital, and social media, Metropolis connects with the most active decision-makers in design — providing a critical spotlight for those pushing the boundaries of what architecture can be. The “Best of the Year” awards honor the most exceptional single entries across key mediums — including photography, rendering, video, drawing, model-making, and unbuilt architectural concept. These works represent the pinnacle of architectural representation and imagination, and Metropolis will help share their impact with a vast international readership. Share My Vision It’s important to note that in order to be eligible for the “Best of the Year” accolades, and with it this publication opportunity, can only be unlocked by specifying this within your submission — make sure to click the “Best of the Year” check box while completing your entry. See Your Work in Print Twice in the Coming Months! Mock up of the Vision Awards feature in Metropolis Magazine. Actual layout design and copy will vary. This major new partnership also doubles the opportunity for Vision Awards participants to be published in print. In addition to the Metropolis feature, all winners across the program’s categories will be showcased in Architizer’s own highly anticipated print volume, How to Visualize Architecture, which is set for release in early 2026. Between these two publications, the Vision Awards offers unmatched exposure for architects and designers working across every stage of the creative process — from concept to communication, and from studio to site. Enter the 2025 Vision Awards today for your chance to be featured in Metropolis Magazine and How to Visualize Architecture, and cement your place among the world’s most visionary architectural thinkers! The Final Entry Deadline is July 11th, 2025 — get started by hitting the blue button: Start My Entry
